column4: How can I solve this?: apt-get install libgtk2.0-0 says "libgtk2.0-0 is already the newest version". ./configure in IceCat says "checking for gtk+-2.0 >= 1.3.7... Package gtk+-2.0 was not found in the pkg-config search path. ".
I know how to set the path but the suggested file does not exist.
